body:
Hello, I'm DiamondPorkchop3!
This is my 1.8 name change help topic!
Come here and ask me for ideas for a 1.8 name change!
I'll try to give you a nice, creative name.
Just give me some specifics and I'll try my best!
Have a great day!
~DiamondPorkchop3:
Edit: Tell me -
Minecraft IGN:
How you are like (Personality):
Hobbies:
Things you like:
Words or numbers wanted in your name:
Edit: Also, I need help :P
Just need opinions
_xXDP3GamingXx_, _xXPorkchopGamingXx_, or  _xXTheDiamondPorkchopXx_?

title: 1.8 Name Changes!

replies.body:
For VSplesk - VirtualPandaRiot or whatever you want in the middle xD
For Ebirdy - FuryFalcon or uh BirdBathFTW? xD
Add or remove anything if you like.
replies.body_tagged:
For VSplesk - VirtualPandaRiot or whatever you want in the middle xD
For Ebirdy - FuryFalcon or uh BirdBathFTW? xD
Add or remove anything if you like.

replies.body: I think all this about the name changes is getting out of hand, do we really need so many topics about it?
replies.body_tagged: I think all this about the name changes is getting out of hand, do we really need so many topics about it?

replies.body: People make many posts about how they need name ideas. This way it lowers those types of posts and people can just come here.
replies.body_tagged: People make many posts about how they need name ideas. This way it lowers those types of posts and people can just come here.

replies.body:
Okay, I won't argue you! Give me some ideas. c:

Minecraft IGN: S3M3L
How you are like (Personality): I'm analytical lol xD Sometimes I feel way over my head just because of that, but most of the times I'm actually right.
Hobbies / Things you like:: Hm ... I enjoy doing everything, I work full-time and have a beautiful girl at home, we like going out just taking a coffee and that kind of stuff. I can say I like what she likes.
Words or numbers wanted in your name: No, no numbers or words. I want something different! c:

replies.body:
Jeezuz Christ you work? You're engaged? How old are you?
You didn't really give much specifics. I couldn't come up with something creative.
Skilled_S3M3L?
SkyXDevil? <-- That was random
_xXRedstone_PuppetXx_ <-- Also random

replies.body:
Lol xD Yes, I do work, I'm not engaged though, she's just my girlfriend! I'm 21! c:

Yes, your ideas was quite random, as I don't do redstone or have any puppets. This was fun xD
